item.title: Support for 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: tbreslow
item.description:
Hi,

I am building an app for the new iPhones but the framework doesn’t seem to support the 64 bit architectures (x86_64 for the simulator and amd64 for the device).

Is this available?

Best,

Todd

item.title: Reply To: Support for 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome Todd,

Yes, I am working away on this as we speak and hope it’s only a matter of weeks. The conversion is a big job and the whole platform has to be released simultaneously which is why it is taking a bit of time.

item.title: Reply To: Support for 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: mcolonj
item.description: how would you recommend building for iOS 7 and iPhone 5s?

item.title: Reply To: Support for 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: For now you can just open up your app build settings and remove the 64-bit architecture from the ARCHITECTURES setting. This will work fine on the 64-bit devices and have no effect on the others.

item.title: Reply To: Support for 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: The new version of OpenEars out now is 64-bit compatible.
